__e: Maybe because I was drunk, and wasn't quite sure about myself...
When you're drunk and when you're hungry - both of which you are most of the time.
But I remember... that you saw how hammered he was and that I let him drive anyway.
Yes, if you are too drunk to drive or whatever...
Are you too drunk to comprehend that means they're done with us?
I told you, I was too drunk to know that I was in the bloody taxi.
You're not that drunk little boy I found passed out on the floor anymore, are you?

I'm worried that... because I drink a lot, I don't always remember stuff what's happened... ..and I-I don't believe that I did kill those women... but perhaps I've got... perhaps I've got so drunk that I've done stuff and... and I-I don't remember doing it.
- Ugh, Charlie, if you think I'm gonna sleep with you right now, you're even more drunk than I thought.
Why? Then you wouldn't know whether your father was drunk or not, would you?
He said he wasn't drunk, either.
You get so you can do that with either hand, when you're half-drunk, half-awake, in a dark room or on a running horse, you might stand a chance.
